pages.title: Basics
pages.text: $(l:warium_integrations:overview/power)Power & Motors$(/l): attach a motor to the blue face; faster tiers = faster machines.

pages.title: Routing
pages.text: $(l:warium_integrations:overview/inputs_outputs)Inputs & Outputs$(/l): production input/output blocks + conveyors move items in/out; keep outputs clear.

pages.title: Assembly
pages.text: $(l:warium_integrations:assembly/foundry)Foundry$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:assembly/assembly_machine)Assembly Machine$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:assembly/assembly_depot)Assembly Depot$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:assembly/assembly_fabricator)Mechanical Fabricator$(/l): core machines for casting, shaping, and assembling components.

pages.title: Processing
pages.text: Chemistry, smelting, and refining: $(l:warium_integrations:processing/centrifuge)Centrifuge$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:processing/digester)Chemical Digester$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:processing/circuit_fabricator)Circuit Fabricator$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:processing/crusher)Crusher$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:processing/thermal_furnace)Thermal Furnace$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:processing/alloy_furnace)Alloy Furnace$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:processing/oil_refinery)Oil Refinery$(/l). Speed scales only with the motor you attach.

pages.title: Nuclear
pages.text: Endgame power generation: $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/reactor_overview)Reactor Overview$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/standard_reactor)Power Reactor$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/fuel_rods)Fuel Rods$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/breeder_reactor)Breeder Reactor$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/cooling_systems)Cooling Systems$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/safety_containment)Safety & Containment$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/uranium_enrichment)Uranium Enrichment$(/l).

pages.title: Ordnance
pages.text: Hand weapons, bombs, missiles, and torpedoes: $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/reloading)Reloading$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bombs_basics)Bomb Basics$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bomb_heavy)Heavy Bomb$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bomb_fire)Fire Bomb$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bomb_cluster)Cluster Bomb$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bomb_ir)IR Seeker$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bomb_sahr)SAHR Seeker$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/torpedo)Torpedo$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bomb_bunker_buster)Bunker Buster$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bomb_fission)Fission Bomb$(/l), $(l:warium_integrations:ordnance/bomb_fusion)Fusion Bomb$(/l).

pages.title: Add-ons
pages.text: $(l:warium_integrations:addons/addon_index)Add-on Index$(/l) collects entries contributed by other Warium modules and expansions.
